summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3151, for the improvement of Holgate Street, from Occidental Avenue to 6th Avenue South, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 38456 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
